overview: Jokowi slowly proves that he is a leader. From the Mayor of Solo, Jakarta Governor, to President. In the process Jokowi encountered various problems. His wife and family plays an important role as a supporter. The film also shows Jokowi as a husband and head of the family at home.
tagline: OUR HOPE RISES WITH THE PRESIDENT OF INDONESIA.
title: Jokowi Adalah Kita
